Package org.elasticsearch.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionFuture<T>
    An extension to Future allowing for simplified "get" operations.
    ActionListener<Response>
    A listener for action responses or failures.
    ListenableActionFuture<T>
    An ActionFuture that listeners can be added to.
    ShardOperationFailedException
    An exception indicating that a failure occurred performing an operation on the shard.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action<Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request,Response,RequestBuilder>,Client extends GenericClient>
    Main action (used with GenericClient API.
    ActionRequest<T extends ActionRequest>  
    ActionRequestBuilder<Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder>  
    ActionResponse  
    GenericAction<Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse>
    A generic action.
    HttpClusterAdminActionModule  
    HttpIndicesAdminActionModule  
    HttpIngestActionModule  
    HttpSearchActionModule  
    ValidateActions  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WriteConsistencyLevel
    Write Consistency Level control how many replicas should be active for a write operation to occur (a write operation can be index, or delete).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActionRequestValidationException  
    TimestampParsingException
